attributes.action: MPs that do not vote to trigger art 50, shall be sacked immediately.
attributes.background: Ordinary people have been ignored since the referendum vote. We are sick/tired of the mainstream media and elites being the only ones who are given coverage to voice an opinion. The vote took place and we voted to leave it was very simple, everyone understood what they voted for and what that meant

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
